title: ArtReview Magazine (UK) Sans Serif
content:
Hello all!

I’ve searched the forum and spent too much time on identifont.com; can somebody pls. help me id this font (used to set “John Currin”)?

Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013235153im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cover200804_6040.jpg)

 [‹ What font is this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013235153/http:/typophile.com/node/44946 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help identifying/finding a font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013235153/http:/typophile.com/node/44924 "Go to next forum topic")
author: new2me
